revised_title: Experimental Studies of Foetal Regression and Phagocytosis in Rabbits
tldr: The author conducted experiments on rabbits to study the processes of foetal regression and phagocytosis after the death of embryos in the uterus. They observed the sequence of tissue regression and the involvement of leucocytes in breaking down necrotic tissue and phagocytosis. The study also examined the potential for maternal sensitization to foetal antigens during the regression process.
